description: Represents a studio that contains other Nimble Studio resources

StudioEncryptionConfiguration.description: Configuration of the encryption method that is used for the studio.

KeyArn.description: The ARN for a KMS key that is used to encrypt studio data.

StudioEncryptionConfigurationKeyType.description: The type of KMS key that is used to encrypt studio data.

AdminRoleArn.description: The IAM role that Studio Admins will assume when logging in to the Nimble Studio portal.
AdminRoleArn.markdownDescription:
The IAM role that Studio Admins will assume when logging in to the Nimble Studio portal.

--- Required: No Type: string Update requires: No interruption

DisplayName.markdownDescription:
A friendly name for the studio.

--- Required: No Type: string Maximum Length: 64 Update requires: No interruption

HomeRegion.description: The Amazon Web Services Region where the studio resource is located.
HomeRegion.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Web Services Region where the studio resource is located.

--- Required: No Type: string Maximum Length: 50 Pattern: [a-z]{2}-?(iso|gov)?-{1}[a-z]*-{1}[0-9] Update requires: No interruption

SsoClientId.description: The Amazon Web Services SSO application client ID used to integrate with Amazon Web Services SSO to enable Amazon Web Services SSO users to log in to Nimble Studio portal.
SsoClientId.markdownDescription:
The Amazon Web Services SSO application client ID used to integrate with Amazon Web Services SSO to enable Amazon Web Services SSO users to log in to Nimble Studio portal.

--- Required: No Type: string Update requires: No interruption

---

Required: No

Type: string

StudioName.description: The studio name that is used in the URL of the Nimble Studio portal when accessed by Nimble Studio users.
StudioName.markdownDescription:
The studio name that is used in the URL of the Nimble Studio portal when accessed by Nimble Studio users.

--- Required: No Type: string Minimum Length: 3 Maximum Length: 64 Pattern: ^[a-z0-9]*$ Update requires: No interruption

StudioUrl.description: The address of the web page for the studio.
StudioUrl.markdownDescription:
The address of the web page for the studio.

--- Required: No Type: string Update requires: No interruption

The IAM role that Studio Users will assume when logging in to the Nimble Studio portal.
